Compatible (specifically written) for iOS 10. Tested on iPhones 7 iOS 10.1.1.

CCSmooth10 gives you visual and useful/functional options to make prettier/smoother/better the Sight and the Behavior of your Control Center.

The Tweak is out of Stage from my Repository, now with the adding of nice Features and Stuff like:

- Make the Control Center Nice with the Translucent Blur Effect.

- Make the Control Center Dark in the Background Backside View.

- Make the Control Center Vertical in the Buttons and Toggles Layout (integration of my Tweak CCButtonsPlumb hosted on my Repository).

- Make the Control Center Sharp in the Element's View.

- Make the Control Center White in the Element's View.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

Configure options from Settings.

Credits are on Preferences Panel.
